title: Slash Commands
description: Slash commands available in Claude Code

commands.name: /add-dir
commands.description: Add additional working directories to the current Claude Code session for broader project context.

commands.name: /bashes
commands.description: List and manage background bash shells running in the current session.

commands.name: /agents
commands.description: Manage agent configurations for custom AI subagents and specialized workflows.

commands.name: /bug
commands.description: Initiates a bug report workflow, helping you to capture and submit issues you encounter.

commands.name: /clear
commands.description: Clears the current conversation history from the REPL, providing a fresh start.

commands.name: /compact
commands.description: Compact conversation with optional focus instructions to summarize previous turns and save tokens.

commands.name: /config
commands.description: Open config panel to view and modify local and global configuration settings.

commands.name: /cost
commands.description: Show the total cost and duration of the current session for tracking usage and expenses.

commands.name: /doctor
commands.description: Checks the health of your Claude Code installation and provides diagnostic information.

commands.name: /help
commands.description: Shows a help message with a list of available slash commands and their functions.

commands.name: /hooks
commands.description: Manage hook configurations for tool events and workflow automation.

commands.name: /ide
commands.description: Manage IDE integrations and show status of connected development environments.

commands.name: /init
commands.description: Initializes a new `CLAUDE.md` file in your project, documenting the codebase to provide better context to Claude.

commands.name: /install-github-app
commands.description: Set up Claude GitHub Actions for a repository to enable automated workflows.

commands.name: /login
commands.description: Starts the authentication process to sign you in with your Anthropic account.

commands.name: /logout
commands.description: Sign out from your Anthropic account and end the current session.

commands.name: /mcp
commands.description: Manage MCP servers for Model Context Protocol integrations and connections.

commands.name: /memory
commands.description: Edit Claude memory files to provide contextual information for your project.

commands.name: /migrate-installer
commands.description: Migrate from global npm installation to local installation for better management.

commands.name: /pr_comments
commands.description: Get comments from a GitHub pull request to review feedback and discussions.

commands.name: /permissions
commands.description: Manage allow & deny tool permission rules for controlling tool access.

commands.name: /review
commands.description: Review a pull request and provide detailed feedback on the proposed changes.

commands.name: /release-notes
commands.description: View release notes for Claude Code updates, changes, and new features.

commands.name: /terminal-setup
commands.description: Installs terminal enhancements, such as enabling Shift+Enter for multi-line input without sending.

commands.name: /upgrade
commands.description: Upgrade to Max for higher rate limits and more Opus access.

commands.name: /vim
commands.description: Toggle between Vim and Normal editing modes in the interactive REPL.

commands.name: /model
commands.description: Set the AI model for Claude Code sessions and configure model preferences.

commands.name: /export
commands.description: Export the current conversation for sharing or archival purposes.

commands.name: /resume
commands.description: Resume a conversation from your session history or start a new one.

commands.name: /output-style
commands.description: Set the output style directly or from a selection menu to customize Claude's response format.

commands.name: /output-style:new
commands.description: Create a custom output style to personalize how Claude formats and presents responses.

commands.name: /statusline
commands.description: Set up Claude Code's status line UI with customizable display options and format preferences.

commands.name: /exit
commands.description: Exits the Claude Code REPL session and returns you to your regular shell prompt.

commands.name: /security-review
commands.description: Complete a security review of the pending changes on the current branch for vulnerability assessment.

commands.name: /status
commands.description: Show Claude Code status including version, model, account, API connectivity, and tool statuses.
